    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Copper penny in iron sulphate solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kupferner Penny in der Eisensulfatlösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Penny de cuivre dans la solution de sulfate de 
fer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moeda de um centavo de cobre na solução do 
sulphate do ferro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Penny di rame nella soluzione del solfato del 
ferro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πένα χαλκού στη λύση θειικού άλατος σιδήρου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Penique de cobre en la solución del sulfato del 
hierro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that copper from the penny cannot displace iron in the sulphate solution because copper is less reactive than iron.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">displacement reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">penny</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Kupfer vom Penny 
nicht Eisen in der Sulfatlösung verlegen kann, weil Kupfer weniger 
reagierend als Eisen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le cuivre du penny 
ne peut pas déplacer le fer dans la solution de sulfate parce que le 
cuivre est moins réactif que le fer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o cobre da moeda de 
um centavo não pode deslocar o ferro na solução do sulphate porque 
o cobre é mais menos reactive do que o ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il rame dal penny
non può spostare il ferro nella soluzione del solfato perché il rame
è meno reattivo che il ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο χαλκός από την πένα
δεν μπορεί να μετατοπίσει το σίδηρο στη λύση θειικού άλατος 
επειδή ο χαλκός είναι λιγότερο αντιδραστικός από το σίδηρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el cobre del penique
no puede desplazar el hierro en la solución del sulfato porque el 
cobre es menos reactivo que el hierro.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
